recipe.title: Feta-Stuffed Watermelon Blocks
ingredients: 3 1/4 pounds watermelon, rind removed, cut into 1 1/2-inch blocks
2 large fresh basil leaves, very thinly sliced
instructions: Using a small melon baller, scoop out the top of each watermelon block. Divide feta among melon hollows. Top each block with basil.
Using a small melon baller, scoop out the top of each watermelon block. Divide feta among melon hollows. Top each block with basil.
